description: A malicious crypto mining campaign codenamed 'REF4578,' has been discovered deploying a malicious payload named GhostEngine that uses vulnerable drivers to turn off security products and deploy an XMRig miner. [...]
title: GhostEngine mining attacks kill EDR security using vulnerable drivers

description: ​Veeam warned customers today to patch a critical security vulnerability that allows unauthenticated attackers to sign into any account via the Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager (VBEM). [...]
title: Veeam warns of critical Backup Enterprise Manager auth bypass bug

description: Today, the LockBit ransomware gang claimed they were behind the April cyberattack on Canadian pharmacy chain London Drugs and is now threatening to publish stolen data online after allegedly failed negotiations. [...]
title: LockBit says they stole data in London Drugs ransomware attack

description: Threat actors were found breaching AWS accounts using authentication secrets leaked as plaintext in Atlassian Bitbucket artifact objects. [...]
title: Atlassian Bitbucket artifacts can leak plaintext auth secrets

description: Rockwell Automation warned customers to disconnect all industrial control systems (ICSs) not designed for online exposure from the Internet due to increasing malicious activity worldwide. [...]
title: Rockwell Automation warns admins to take ICS devices offline

description: GitHub has fixed a maximum severity (CVSS v4 score: 10.0) authentication bypass vulnerability tracked as CVE-2024-4986, which impacts GitHub Enterprise Server (GHES) instances using SAML single sign-on (SSO) authentication. [...]
title: GitHub warns of SAML auth bypass flaw in Enterprise Server
